pullrequest.title: Refactor EntityComponentManager to be more thread safe

content.raw: Possibly. I think it's the simplest and least error prone solution though. Assuming that most systems interact with the ECS via `Each` calls, I deliberately avoided locking the mutex when invoking the callbacks. I would hope that helps avoid some contention. The next step would be to remove mutable access to components and provide a way to update components without locks.
